definitions.text: the 2nd smallest continent (actually a vast peninsula of Eurasia); the British use `Europe' to refer to all of the continent except the British Isles
an international organization of European countries formed after World War II to reduce trade barriers and increase cooperation among its members
examples: he tried to take Britain into the Europen Union

definitions.text: the nations of the European continent collectively
examples: the Marshall Plan helped Europe recover from World War II
